name: Minecraft Level.dat Backup File
summary: Learn about .DAT_MCR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The level.dat_mcr file can be restored to the level.dat file if you want to revert to the older world format.
NOTE: Minecraft Snapshot 12w07b was the first version to update to the Anvil world format.

description: File created by Minecraft, an open-ended 3D construction game; saves a backup of the level.dat file when the newer version of the game updates from the older "Region" (.MCR) format to the newer "Anvil" (.MCA) format.
